alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo County through 300 PM CDT... At 230 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Durand, or 9 miles west of Mondovi, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 223 PM, a spotter reported dime size hail in Nelson. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mondovi around 235 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Misha Mokwa, Maxville, The Big Swamp Area, Urne and County Roads F And K K. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
